plot outline: Young and attractive Roma Pinto is the only girl in the struggling Pinto family, consisting of five brothers, with assorted careers. They are very protective and affectionate towards her, and will not any woo her without their express permission. When Sameer Malhotra enters Roma's life, both fall in love, and decide to get married. The problem is Sameer's father is a wealthy industrialist, who will never permit his son to get married to a poor girl like Roma. And Roma's brothers do not approve of Sameer and will not permit him under any circumstances to get close to Roma, and will go to the extent of killing anyone who gets in their way.
title: Paagalpan
